text: innum, avarkal ettakaiyorenral tankal iraivanin poruttattait teti, porumaiyaik kataippitipparkal; tolukaiyaiyum nilainiruttuvarkal; nam avarkalukku alittatiliruntu irakaciyamakavum, pakirankamakavum (nanmuraiyil) celavu ceyvarkal; nanmaiyaik konte timaiyait tatuttuk kolvarkal. Ittakaiyorukke marumaiyil (cavanapati yennum) nalla vitu irukkiratu
